name: Tank Formula
description:
Tank Formula is a top down tank shooter game based on "Battle City".

Defeating around 20 enemy tanks will clear the stage. You can use the collected coins to strengthen your tank. The objective is to clear all 36 stages. 

Controls
  • Arrow Keys or WSAD - Move
  • Space or Z - Shoot
  • X - Use Ability
  • ESC - Pause
Player Player TankA tank you control.
When destroyed, the game is over.CoreYou have to protect this.
The game is over when this is destroyed. Enemies NameDescription
Normal TankBasicPower TankFast bulletHard TankFast bullet and great power. 
Can be defeated by hitting 4 bullets.Speed TankHigh speed tank.Kamikaze TankCharges the player and causes great damage. Items NameDescriptionCoinCollected coins can be used to enhance the player and purchase abilities.HealthRestore the player's HP.
